questions.question: How to start trading on your platform?
questions.answer: To start trading, register an account and fund your balance with broker Pocket Option. After that, you're ready to take your first step in trading.

questions.question: Do I need to pay for signals?
questions.answer: No! Signals from AI BOOST USA are completely free, but to get access you need to be our referral on Pocket Option and deposit $10.

questions.question: Is experience required for trading?
questions.answer: Our platform is designed for both beginners and professionals, so anyone can start.

questions.question: What are trading signals and how to use them?
questions.answer: Trading signals are recommendations that help make decisions about buying or selling assets based on market analysis. Use them to increase the accuracy of your trades.

questions.question: What deposit methods are available?
questions.answer: Account funding is handled on the Pocket Option platform side.

questions.question: Is there 24/7 support?
questions.answer: Yes, if you have any questions, you can contact our team via Telegram.
